medium: Oil and gouache on Japan nacre paper, mounted on board
title: Les Corps des Esprits
description: Surrealist style; six abstracted head-like forms in various colors with large cutout eyes; six tan spheres in foreground; three rock-like elements connected by black lines; two red forms connected with string-like lines in \"eye sockets\" of grey head; two other balls--red and blue
creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
